name: gitworkspace
description: A convenient Git-based file explorer that displays (1) currently changed files, and (2) ALL files ever modified by the current branch (since its creation!) for one or more Git repositories.

gitWorkspace.path_to_repository.description:
The paths to the desired git repositories.

Please provide absolute paths using the correct format for your operating system: For Windows paths should start with a drive letter like 'C:' and can use either backslashes ('\') or forward slashes ('/'). On Unix-like systems (Linux, macOS and WSL), use forward slashes ('/').
gitWorkspace.path_to_repository.markdownDescription:
**The paths to the desired git repositories.**

_Please provide absolute paths using the correct format for your operating system: For Windows paths should start with a drive letter like `C:` and can use either backslashes (`\`) or forward slashes (`/`). On Unix-like systems (Linux, macOS and WSL), use forward slashes (`/`)._

gitWorkspace.path_to_git_executable.description:
OPTIONAL: Path to a specific git executable. If none is provided, the extension will try to use the one found in your PATH.

Please provide absolute paths using the correct format for your operating system: For Windows paths should start with a drive letter like 'C:' and can use either backslashes ('\') or forward slashes ('/'). On Unix-like systems (Linux, macOS and WSL), use forward slashes ('/').
gitWorkspace.path_to_git_executable.markdownDescription:
_OPTIONAL_: **Path to a specific git executable.** If none is provided, the extension will try to use the one found in your PATH.

_Please provide an absolute path using the correct format for your operating system: For Windows paths should start with a drive letter like `C:` and can use either backslashes (`\`) or forward slashes (`/`). On Unix-like systems (Linux, macOS and WSL), use forward slashes (`/`)._

gitWorkspace.useFileWatchers.description: Enable automatic view updates when files in the specified repositories are created, changed, or deleted.
gitWorkspace.useFileWatchers.markdownDescription: Enable automatic view updates when files in the specified repositories are created, changed, or deleted.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
